posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: webpack
posts.text: JavaScript 模块化七日谈 #book外国人书籍

posts.title: 模块化开发-js
posts.text: 模块化开发模块化的话，首先看一下）这个系列视频（Modular JavaScript了解怎么用原生JavaScript实现模块化 然后可以看一下Addy Osmani关于模块化的这篇文章：Writing Modular JavaScript With AMD, CommonJS & ES Harmony 例子123456789101112131415161718192021<div class="container"> <div class="row"> <!-- peopelModel--> <div id="peopleModule"> <h1>People</h1> <input placeholder="name" type="text"> <button id="addPerson">Add Person</button> <ul id="people"> <script id="people-template" type="text/template"> {{#people}} <li> <span>{{.}}</span> <i class="del">X</i> </li> {{/people}} </script> </ul> </div> <!--end peopelModel --> </div></div 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546var people = { people: ['Will', 'Steve'], init: function() { this.cacheDom(); this.bindEvents(); this.render(); }, cacheDom: function() { this.$el = $('#peopleModule'); this.$button = this.$el.find('button'); this.$input = this.$el.find('input'); this.$ul = this.$el.find('ul'); this.template = this.$el.find('#people-template').html(); }, bindEvents: function() { this.$button.on('click', this.addPerson.bind(this)); this.$ul.delegate('i.del', 'click', this.deletePerson.bind(this)); }, render: function() { var data = { people: this.people, }; this.$ul.html(Mustache.render(this.template, data)); }, addPerson: function() { var text = $.trim(this.$input.val()); if (text =="") { return false; } else { console.log("text"); } this.people.push(this.$input.val()); this.render(); this.$input.val(''); }, deletePerson: function(event) { var $remove = $(event.target).closest('li'); var i = this.$ul.find('li').index($remove); this.people.splice(i, 1); this.render(); }};people.init();

posts.title: js模板文件开-mustache.js
posts.text: Mustacne使用12345678var view = { title: "Joe", calc: function () { return 2 + 4; }};var output = Mustache.render("{{title}} spends {{calc}}", view); 搭配JQ123456789<!DOCTYPE HTML><html><body onload="loadUser()"><div id="target">Loading...</div><script id="template" type="x-tmpl-mustache">Hello {{ name }}!</script></body></html> 123456function loadUser() { var template = $('#template').html(); Mustache.parse(template); // optional, speeds up future uses var rendered = Mustache.render(template, {name: "Luke"}); $('#target').html(rendered);} if 判断1234567891011121314//view{ "person": false}//templateShown.{{#person}}Never shown!{{/person}}//outputShown. 12345678910111213{ "repos": []}//Template:{{#repos}}<b>{{name}}</b>{{/repos}}{{^repos}}No repos :({{/repos}}//Output:No repos :( 数组循环12345678//View:{ "stooges": [ { "name": "Moe" }, { "name": "Larry" }, { "name": "Curly" } ]} 1234//Template:{{#stooges}}<b>{{name}}</b>{{/stooges}} 12345//Output:<b>Moe</b><b>Larry</b><b>Curly</b>} 1234//View:{ "musketeers": ["Athos", "Aramis", "Porthos", "D'Artagnan"]} 1234//Template:{{#musketeers}}* {{.}}{{/musketeers}} 123456//Output:* Athos* Aramis* Porthos* D'Artagnan function123456789101112//View:{ "beatles": [ { "firstName": "John", "lastName": "Lennon" }, { "firstName": "Paul", "lastName": "McCartney" }, { "firstName": "George", "lastName": "Harrison" }, { "firstName": "Ringo", "lastName": "Starr" } ], "name": function () { return this.firstName + " " + this.lastName; }} 1234//Template:{{#beatles}}* {{name}}{{/beatles}} 123456//Output:* John Lennon* Paul McCartney* George Harrison* Ringo Starr

posts.title: hexo
posts.text: 日常维护和使用搭建配置hexo-theme-icarus hexo教程系列——hexo配置教程 玩转hexo博客之next 主题hexo-theme-yilia屠城hexo博客换主题–icarus 安装和使用 yaila参考-Hexo 主题设置 1$ git clone https://github.com/litten/hexo-theme-yilia.git themes/yilia 修改_config.yml文件 theme: yilia 侧边栏123456# Headermenu: 主页: / 随笔: /tags/随笔/ cai: /categories/进阶/cai/ 自己分类。。 备份通过github分支使用hexo，如果换了电脑怎么更新博客？ 插件hexo-admin 使用文章摘要<!-- more --> <!-- more -->上面的内容就是显示在主页的摘要。 banner/photo文章开头添加123photo: - http://img.blog.csdn.net/20151129213701642banner: http://img.blog.csdn.net/2015112921370164 添加视频 ，音乐 Idina Menze和Caleb Hyles激情对唱Let It Go：
